# Upgrade Plan

## Overview
Upgrade to the latest LTS versions (Java 21 and Spring Boot 3.4).

## Tasks
See tasks.json for detailed task breakdown.

## Target Versions
- **Java**: 21 (LTS)
- **Spring Boot**: 3.4
- **Spring Framework**: 6.x

## Key Changes
- JDK upgrade to version 21
- Spring Boot and Spring Framework upgrade to latest versions
- Migration from javax.* to jakarta.* namespace (if applicable)
- Dependency updates for compatibility
